C:\Windows\system32\wsl.exe --distribution Ubuntu-20.04 --exec "/mnt/c/Program Files/JetBrains/CLion 2023.3.2/bin/ttyfix" /bin/bash -c "export CLION_IDE=TRUE && export CMAKE_COLOR_DIAGNOSTICS=ON && export JETBRAINS_IDE=TRUE && cd /home/alon/project/cmake-build-debug && /usr/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G 'CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles' -S /home/alon/project -B /home/alon/project/cmake-build-debug; exitcode=$?; sleep 0.001; (exit $exitcode)"

-- The CXX compiler identification is GNU 9.4.0
